attributes.action: Bring back the JAWS ride in Orlando, Universal Studios. Florida.
attributes.background: I loved Jaws and everything about it since i was a child. My long awaited trip to Florida finally came, to discover the ride had been closed. Im absolutely devastated!!!!! PLEASE BRING BACK THE JAWS RIDE! Its the only one thing i need to do to complete my life.

rejection.details: You could raise this issue directly with Universal Studios.
